parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space the approval is created in

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the kapp the approval is created in

parameter.label: Approval Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form the approval is created for

parameter.label: Team Name
parameter.tooltip: Approver Team Name

parameter.label: Summary
parameter.tooltip: A summary of what is being approved

parameter.label: Details
parameter.tooltip: A description of what is being approved

parameter.label: Days Due
parameter.tooltip: Number of days from now the approval is to be completed by

parameter.label: Originating System
parameter.tooltip: Source of parent record (Kinetic Core, Salesforce...etc)

parameter.label: Originating Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of originating systems record

parameter.label: Originating Url
parameter.tooltip: Url to the originating systems record

parameter.label: System Input
parameter.tooltip: Structured data that can be leveraged by the approval record

result.name: Denial Reason
result.tooltip: The reason given for why an approval was denied

result.name: Notes for Customer
result.tooltip: Any additional comments the approver provided

result.name: Approver Id
result.tooltip: The Id of the approver who completed the approval

result.name: Approval Submission Id
result.tooltip: The Id of the approval submission

result.name: Fields JSON
result.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the approval record

messages.message: Approval Sent to: <%=@results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual'].nil? ? @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team Display Name'] : @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual']%>

task.label: Activity Update
task.value: @trigger['Message'] == "Activity Update" && @results.has_key?('Create Activity Record') && @results['Create Activity Record'].has_key?('Id') && !@results['Create Activity Record']['Id'].nil? && @inputs['Originating System'] == "Kinetic Core" && !@inputs['Originating Id'].to_s.empty?

parameters.parameter:
This routine is designed to create a Team Approval in Kinetic Core. This routine is designed to be agnostic of what system is creating the approval (e.g. it doesn't necessarily need to be originated via a Kinetic Request Portal Submission)
Name: KD Individual Approval Create Def: routine_kd_individual_approval_create_v1

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve answers from

task.label: Notes or Denied
task.value: ((@results['Retrieve Approval Answers'].has_key?('Notes for Customer') && !@results['Retrieve Approval Answers']['Notes for Customer'].nil?) || @results['Retrieve Approval Answers']['Decision'] == "Denied") && @inputs['Originating System'] == "Kinetic Core" && !@inputs['Originating Id'].to_s.empty?

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space where the submission exists

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to update

parameter.label: State
parameter.tooltip: Sets the submission state

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON object of the form values to be pre-populated

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the Page the Submission to Open to

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Sets the current page navigation

parameter.label: Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Origin Id

parameter.label: Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Parent Id

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to create the submission in

parameter.label: Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the kapp to create the submission in

parameter.label: Form Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the form to create the submission in

parameter.label: Values
parameter.tooltip: JSON object of the form values to be pre-populated

parameters.parameter: <%= # Build Due Date dueDate = (DateTime.now + @inputs['Days Due'].to_f).iso8601 { "Assigned Team" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team'], "Assigned Team Display Name" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team Display Name'], "Assigned Individual" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual'], "Assigned Individual Display Name" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual Display Name'], "Deferral Token" => @results['Approval']['deferral_token'], "Details" => @inputs['Details'], "Due Date" => dueDate, "Originating Id" => @inputs['Originating Id'], "Originating System" => @inputs['Originating System'], "Originating Url" => @inputs['Originating Url'], "Status" => "Open", "Summary" => @inputs['Summary'], "System Input" => @inputs['System Input'], "Discussion Id" => "" }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Current Page Name
parameter.tooltip: Name of the Page the Submission to Open to

parameter.label: Current Page Navigation
parameter.tooltip: Sets the current page navigation

parameter.label: Origin Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Origin Id

parameter.label: Parent Id
parameter.tooltip: Sets the Parent Id

parameter.label: Decision
parameter.tooltip: The approvers decision (typically “Approved” or “Denied”)

parameter.label: Denial Reason
parameter.tooltip: The reason given for why an approval was denied

parameter.label: Notes for Customer
parameter.tooltip: Any additional comments the approver provided

parameter.label: Approver Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the approver who completed the approval

parameter.label: Approval Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the approval submission

parameter.label: Fields JSON
parameter.tooltip: A JSON map of questions that were answered on the approval record

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to find the submission in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to retrieve answers from

parameter.label: Recipient List
parameter.tooltip: Comma separated list of recipients (Usernames, SMTP Addresses, and/or Team Names)

parameter.label: JSON Vars
parameter.tooltip: JSON input of miscellaneous values. These values are used to replace placeholder content in notification messages.

parameters.parameter:
<%={
          "Note" => @results['Retrieve Approval Answers']['Notes for Customer'],
          "Denial Reason" => @results['Retrieve Approval Answers']['Denial Reason']
        }.to_json %>

parameter.label: System
parameter.tooltip: System to search for ID. Defaults to Request

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Space Slug of the submission to get values for. Used to retrieve Request submissions, notification templates, users.

parameter.label: ID
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to get values for, required if using those or attachments in the message

parameter.label: Admin Kapp Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of this spaces admin kapp (typically admin)

parameter.label: Kapp Slug Initiating Notification
parameter.tooltip: The slug of the Kapp sending the notification (ex: catalog, queue, etc.)

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space to create the form in

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: The Id of the Submission for which an activity record should be created

parameter.label: Label
parameter.tooltip: Label for the Submission Activity Record

parameter.label: Description
parameter.tooltip: Description for the Submission Activity Record

parameters.parameter: An Approval Task Was Needed for Fulfillment

parameter.label: Type
parameter.tooltip: Type of Submission Activity Record

parameter.label: Data
parameter.tooltip: Data for the Submission Activity Record (used by the renderer, sometimes complex JSON objects)

parameters.parameter: <%= { "Assigned Team" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Team'], "Assigned Individual" => @results['Verify Assignment']['Assigned Individual'], "Status" => "Pending Approval", "Comments" => nil, "Decision" => nil, "Denial Reason" => nil }.to_json %>

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: Slug of the space where the submission exists

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the submission to update

parameter.label: Observing Teams
parameter.tooltip: JSON array of team names to add to Observing Teams field on Submission

parameter.label: Observing Individuals
parameter.tooltip: JSON array of usernames to add to Observing Individuals field on Submission

parameter.label: Replace Existing
parameter.tooltip: true or false if existing observers should be replaced

parameter.label: Activity Record Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Activity Record to Update

parameter.label: Task Record Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Task (approval) record to get update data from

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the Space this submission belongs to

parameter.label: Activity Record Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Activity Record to Update

parameter.label: Task Record Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Task (approval) record to get update data from

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the Space this submission belongs to

parameter.label: Space Slug
parameter.tooltip: The Slug of the Space this submission belongs to

parameter.label: Submission Id
parameter.tooltip: Id of the Submission to add a message to

parameter.label: Message
parameter.tooltip: Discussion Message to create for the given submission

parameters.parameter:
This approval was intended to be routed to the <%=@inputs['Team Name']%> Team; however, the following issue occurred:
<%=@results['Verify Assignment']['Assignment Error']%>

parameter.label: Discussion Label
parameter.tooltip: Label Tag added to discussion if being created via this process
